product_name: Nike Studio Pack Wrap Shoes - Women's
long_description: From the yoga studio to the streets, wear the Nike Studio Pack Wrap shoes 3 different ways-as a wrap for in-studio use, with the ribbons for extra support, and with the flats for full coverage. Studio Pack Wrap shoes offer traction to help prevent slipping; add the ribbons for enhanced support around the arches and ankles; slip on the flats for full coverage. Stretch foam and synthetic mesh uppers are soft against bare feet. Silicone traction pattern on the soles of the Studio Wrap grips indoor surfaces. Includes a mesh garment bag for easy storage.
short_description: From the yoga studio to the streets, wear the Nike Studio Pack Wrap shoes 3 different ways-as a wrap for in-studio use, with the ribbons for extra support, and with the flats for full coverage.
